title: That the Council minutes from the meeting of August 12, 2024, be approved.

That items Strong Mayor Power, Report MOAIR24-004 - Leasing Opportunity, Report IPGPL24-025 - Zoning By-law Amendment for 78 and 82 Lansdowne Street West, Report - Presentation - Dr. Piggott, Medical Officer of Health, Report FCSFS24-016 - City of Peterborough Holdings Inc. - 2023 Annual Report, and Report IPGENG24-004 - Traffic Technical Working Group, be approved on Consent.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report IPGPL24-024, dated August 26, 2023 of the Commissioner, Infrastructure, Planning and Growth Management as follows: a) That the subject properties be rezoned from D.1 – Development District to R.1- Residential District (429 Raymond Street) and R.1-2o -H – Residential District (431 Raymond Street) in accordance with the draft amendment attached as Appendix C to Report IPGPL24-024; and b) That the ‘H’-Holding Symbol be removed from the lands zoned R.1-2o-H (431 Raymond Street) at such time that the encroachment of the pool apron on 435 Raymond Street is resolved.

That the following By-laws be approved: 24-065 Being a By-law to authorize the undertaking of energy efficiency, energy, climate change adaptation and mitigation, and water conservation works on private residential property as local improvements under the HEEP residential energy retrofit program 24-066 Being a By-law to temporarily exempt Block 135, Registered Plan 45M-262 from Part Lot Control 24-067 Being a By-law to temporarily exempt Blocks 127 and 128, Registered Plan 45M-262 from Part Lot Control 24-068 Being a By-law to amend the Zoning By-law for the lands known as 78 and 82 Lansdowne Street West

That the following By-laws be approved: 24-065 Being a By-law to authorize the undertaking of energy efficiency, energy, climate change adaptation and mitigation, and water conservation works on private residential property as local improvements under the HEEP residential energy retrofit program 24-066 Being a By-law to temporarily exempt Block 135, Registered Plan 45M-262 from Part Lot Control 24-067 Being a By-law to temporarily exempt Blocks 127 and 128, Registered Plan 45M-262 from Part Lot Control 24-068 Being a By-law to amend the Zoning By-law for the lands known as 78 and 82 Lansdowne Street West That By-law 24-069, Being a By-law to amend the Zoning By-law for the lands known as 427 and 431 Raymond Street, be approved.
That By-law 24-070, Being a By-law to confirm the proceedings of the Council at its meeting held on September 3, 2024, be approved..
That this meeting be adjourned at 8:10 p.m.
